Name: Dead Bits
About the game: Quilly was abducted by aliens, now, he has to fight for his freedom! Destroy cube aliens with guns, bats and inteligence... avoid traps and more. Dead Bits is a first-person shooter with original dubstep soundtrack for Windows and Mac. Entirely made out of cubes; A lot of weapons and enemies; Original dubstep / electronic soundtrack produced by Frost Orb. (Youtuber - Markiplier) (Youtuber - Fer0m0nas)
